name: Righteous King of Knights, Saber
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Strike Air" is in your climax area, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Master》or 《Servant》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Master, your orders!

name: Justice On Behalf of Another, Shirou
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: The one I must fight… is still in this city.

name: Entrusted Arm of Archer, Shirou
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your memory has 2 or less cards, you may put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: Yeah. I love you, Sakura.

name: Reaching for the Grail, Saber
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may choose 1 of your "Black Shadow", and put this card face down underneath that card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: It cannot be!

name: Sword Shrouded by Wind, Saber
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, return it to his or her hand, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Blushing, Shirou
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] Choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Well, she's famous. And she always kind of stands out, so…

name: Savage King of Heroes, Gilgamesh
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 cost 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: You are spellbound by something not so good.

name: As a Master, Shirou
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Solitary Return" is in your climax area, and your stock has 5 or less cards, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I… I'll fight. I'll fight as a Master!

name: "Rain" Shirou
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 "Irreplaceable Existence, Sakura" from among them, put it on any position on your stage, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another "Irreplaceable Existence, Sakura", this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I will… continue to forgive you in your place.

name: Injury's Status, Shirou
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other characters with "Saber (セイバー)" or "Shirou (士郎)" or "Sakura (桜)" in its card name, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Even after my shoulder healed, this life didn't change.

name: What I Can Do, Shirou
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: It's been a while since we did this last time.

name: Entrusted, Shirou
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters.

name: Friendly Teacher, Taiga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters with "Shirou (士郎)" or "Sakura (桜)" in its card name, and that card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may choose 1 card in your opponent's clock, and put it into his or her waiting room. If you do, your opponent puts the top card of your opponent's deck into his or her clock.
flavorText: For Shirou, Kiritsugu was a hero! So that's probably why he was mimicking him. Sakura, you have someone like that, too, right?

name: Foreign Acquaintance? Saber
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Strong Sense of Justice, Shirou" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Shirou (士郎)" in its card name get "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: No, please don't worry about it.

name: Student Council President, Issei
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power.
flavorText: Emiya, are you dating Matou's little sister?

name: Archery Club President, Ayako
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.
flavorText: Hey, you! Are you interested in archery?

name: Golden Benevolence, Gilgamesh
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: The grace period is now over. This is my mercy to you.

name: Smile Lit by Sunrise, Saber
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".

name: A Servant's Power Sealed Within
text: Search your deck for up to 1 "Justice On Behalf of Another, Shirou", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory. 【CONT】 Memory If this card is in your memory, all of your "Justice On Behalf of Another, Shirou" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, and shuffle your deck."
flavorText: Of course you're surprised that I look like this.

name: Strike Air
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【SHOT】: During this turn, when the next damage dealt by the attacking character that triggered this card is canceled, deal 1 damage to your opponent)

name: Solitary Return
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavorText: I'm sorry. And… I'm home, Sakura.

name: "presage flower" Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is 【TREASURE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Irreplaceable Existence, Sakura
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Shirou (士郎)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Storytime" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Brillant Smile, Sakura
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: And my future goal is to cook something tastier than your dishes. And I think I'll be getting in range pretty soon.

name: Monstrous Glance, Rider
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Mystic Eyes of Petrification" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets the following 2 abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot frontal attack." "【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -3000 power."
flavorText: I cannot abide by that command. I prioritize your life more than anything else.

name: Rider Attacking
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Sakura (桜)" in its card name, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.

name: Peaceful Morning, Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Good morning!

name: Distortion of Daily Life, Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle oppponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Flexible Physique, Rider
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. Ｘ is equal to the number of 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have ×500.

name: FLUFFY, Sakura
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more green characters or characters with "Shirou (士郎)" in its card name, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other green characters, this card gets the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's level 1 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "I'm starved!" is in your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, put it into your stock, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Huff-puff, floating and flying is when you become an adult.

name: "Protection from Arrows" Lancer
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot receive damage by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: It's my nature. Projectiles don't work against me.

name: Enchanting Beauty, Rider
text: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Sakura (桜)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: Sakura's happiness is to have you stay alive and stay by her side.

name: Sakura Waiting to Return Together
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Injury's Status, Shirou" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Injury's Status, Shirou" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Agonizing Decision, Shinji
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] If this card is the top card of your clock, at the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: True Intentions, Rider
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Brillant Smile, Sakura" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Brillant Smile, Sakura" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: You are fine, I see. That is splendid.

name: Master's Capability, Rider
text: 【CONT】 If you have another ""presage flower" Sakura" on your back stage, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 ""presage flower" Sakura" or "Distortion of Daily Life, Sakura", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "Rain" Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Shirou: "No matter what happens, even if you try to kill yourself, I'll protect you, Sakura."

name: Anti-Heroic Knight, Rider
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock.

name: Final Command Spell, Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 green character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Anti-Heroic Knight, Rider" in your waiting room, and put it on any position on your stage. 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Brillant Smile, Sakura" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: This is the final Command Spell! Please, Rider.

name: Ulster's Hero, Lancer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When "Fate-Changing Blow" is put on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, and you have 4 or more other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 3 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: Was that your handiwork?

name: First-Time Substitute Master, Shinji
text: 【CONT】 Memory If "Spellbook of Fake Authority" is in your memory, all of your other 《Servant》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 "Spellbook of Fake Authority" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: When it comes to the Holy Grail War, they're even said to be one of the Three Great Families.

name: Study Mode, Sakura
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Helping Out at the Emiya Household, Sakura
text: 【CONT】 If you are level 1 or higher, this card gets 《Housework》. 【CONT】 If you are level 2 or higher, this card gets 《Cooking》. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Shirou: "H-Hey!"

name: Battle-Hungry Smile, Lancer
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: "Servant Chase" Lancer
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand. 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage.
flavorText: I'm not letting you get away.

name: "Monstrous Strength" Rider
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Shinji: "You're not getting it at all, as always! You already understand, don't you?"

name: Warrior with Backbone, Lancer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Soon enough.

name: Having a Nightmare, Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your stock has 2 or less cards, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn." 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: Spellbook of Fake Authority
text: Search your deck for up to 2 "Mysterious Knight, Rider", put them on separate positions on your stage, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.

name: Storytime
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Senpai, do you remember?

name: Mystic Eyes of Petrification
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: I'm starved!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Ah- Chomp chomp

name: Fate-Changing Blow
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: It's a bit far, but I'll settle it now!

name: Ruthless King of Knights, Saber Alter
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It seems everything is done now. I will leave you with the rest, Assassin.

name: "In Charge of Fuyuki" Rin
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play event cards from hand. 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 level 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.

name: Heroic Spirit With Complex Past, Archer
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put 1 《Weapon》 character or character with "Rin (凛)" in its card name into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Ultimate Choice" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Weapon》 character or character with "Rin (凛)" in its card name, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 6 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of trigger icons revealed among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
I feel that fighting together
with a powerless Master is meaningless.

name: Variety of Fighting Styles, Archer
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: If we carelessly feed her magical energy, we can't revert her!

name: Dreamt of Moment, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Distance Separating the Two" is in your climax area, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 from your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】.
flavorText: Th-Th-Th-There's nothing strange about that!

name: Black Shadow
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if your stock has less cards than your opponent's stock, you may put this card into your stock." 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, and your level is 2 or higher, this card gets the following ability. "【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Overwhelming Strength, Saber Alter" in your waiting room, and put it on any position on your stage."
flavorText: Shirou: "What in the hell… are you?"

name: Awkward Relationship, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: That's why I… am going to kill her.

name: HEROIC, Rin & Archer
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your deck has 5 or less cards, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck, and draw 1 card.

name: Overwhelming Strength, Saber Alter
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters. 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets -1 soul. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: Straightforward Sense of Justice, Rin
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from hand. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, all of your characters get +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Can I assume that was all your doing, elder of Matou?

name: Shocked Expression, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Heroic Spirit With Complex Past, Archer" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Heroic Spirit With Complex Past, Archer" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Imaginary space?

name: Standing By in the Rain, Archer
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 When you level up, put this card into your waiting room. 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 0 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)

name: Decisive Judgement, Archer
text: 【AUTO】 Memory [Put 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, if "Entrusted Arm of Archer, Shirou" is in your memory, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Entrusted, Shirou" in your waiting room, and put it on any position on your stage as 【REST】.
flavorText: It seems that this is not the situation where I can prioritize my personal business.

name: Stellar Offense and Defense, Saber Alter
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each character on your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Excalibur Morgan" is in your climax area, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Beauty Feigning Innocence, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So losing no time… Can you come out tonight?

name: Revealed Face, Saber Alter
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Battle Stance, Archer
flavorText: Rin: "Archer!"

name: Knight Clothed in Black, Saber Alter
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters. 【ACT】 [【REST】 1 of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Offering Protection, Rin
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】) 【ACT】 [Put 1 "Battle Stance, Archer" from your hand into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: And this can't possibly be everything, can it?

name: Pair of Swords, Archer
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other characters with "Rin (凛)" or "Archer (アーチャー)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Making Plans, Rin
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Heroic Spirit With Complex Past, Archer" get +1000 power. 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: There was another comatose incident in New City this morning.

name: Sakura's Ribbon
text: Put this card into your memory. 【CONT】 Memory If this card is in your memory, all of your characters with "Sakura (桜)" in its card name get +500 power.
flavorText: Miss Tohsaka is so pretty and cool.

name: Shadow that Engulfs Heroic Spirits
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of your battle opponent is equal to or lower than this card's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."
flavorText: True Assassin: "Servants cannot oppose that shadow."

name: Distance Separating the Two
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Ultimate Choice
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I have created over a thousand blades.

name: Excalibur Morgan
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Mysterious Girl, Illyasviel
text: 【CONT】 If "Mad Warrior's Howl, Berserker" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: I know everything, you see.

name: Dirty Tactics, True Assasin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: One of Many Faces, Illyasviel
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 blue character or character with "Shirou (士郎)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Shirou: "!?"

name: Mad Warrior's Howl, Berserker
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Illya (イリヤ)" in its card name, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.

name: Fearless Smile, Illyasviel
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Valorous Warrior, Berserker
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Cutthroat Battle" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +3000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, 【STAND】 this card, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your memory."

name: Rule Breaker, Caster
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's characters, put it into your opponent's memory, your opponent puts that character from your opponent's memory on any position of his or her stage.
flavorText: You're the true Assassin?

name: Spectating the Battle, Illyasviel
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Winter's Lorelei" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other blue characters or characters with "Shirou (士郎)" in its card name, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Sella, have a car ready to go. I will head out into the city starting tomorrow.

name: Tenacious, Berserker
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have another "One of Many Faces, Illyasviel", 【REST】 this card.

name: One of Three Great Families, Illyasviel
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'm Illya. Illyasviel von Einzbern.

name: Unsettling Warning, Illyasviel
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Mad Warrior's Howl, Berserker", put it on any position on your stage, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: If you don't summon yours soon, you're gonna die, Big Brother.

name: Easygoing Swordsman, Assassin
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, if your opponent has 3 or less characters on his or her stage, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If "Masked Hitman, True Assassin" is among those cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Masked Hitman, True Assassin" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I didn't expect… something so abhorred…

name: "5th Holy Grail War's Overseer" Kirei
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: I would give every bit of myself, and I shall question even my Lord until death.

name: Masked Hitman, True Assassin
text: 【CONT】 If your opponent has a character with 500 power or lower, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Zabaniya" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 blue character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +1 level and +2500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: You… lose!

name: Fierce Presence, Berserker
text: 【CONT】 During the attack phase, you cannot return characters from your waiting room to your hand by your cards' effects. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Kotomine's Meal
text: Look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have.
flavorText:
Kirei: "Want to eat?"
Shirou: "Like I'd eat!"

name: Cutthroat Battle
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Winter's Lorelei
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: I don't know who you are, but that belongs to the Einzberns.

name: Zabaniya
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: petit Shirou
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 level and +2500 power.
flavorText: If you do something bad, I'll admonish you.

name: petit Sakura
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: So, you're not going to be in danger anymore, right?

name: petit Rin
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, this card cannot be played from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: I'll have you follow your Master's morals.

name: petit Illyasviel
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You're still alive, Big Brother!

name: Spring Season, Sakura
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I think I'll be all right… if I could just be together with you.
